Name: Baby & Me Group with the PJ Library
Description: In partnership with the PJ Library of the Levine JCC, this support group provides a safe space to meet other moms, parents, and caregivers to find support & knowledge alongside each other and local perinatal experts.
Details: Organized by MindBodyBaby meets at PJ Library
When: Meets every other Friday at 10:30am. Check website!

Address: 4418 Monroe Rd Unit E, Charlotte, NC 28205
Description: "To help mothers worldwide to breastfeed through mother-to-mother support, encouragement, information, and education, and to promote a better understanding of breastfeeding as an important element in the healthy development of the baby and mother."
When: Meets the third Thursday of each month at 10:00 am
